matrix-project.description: Creates the Embedded Gaming VDK's installers for Windows and Linux

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off
::- VDK_EG_sources_1.0-0.35-Alpha.7z ::- Extract MajorNumber, MinorNumber, BuildNumber, SubMinor Number and Milestone from the above
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
::- Get the archive filename on which we will operate for /r %%i in (VDK_%V%_sources_%OSTYPE%_*.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION%) do ( set ARCHIVE_FILENAME=%%~ni )
echo ARCHIVE_FILENAME: !ARCHIVE_FILENAME!
::- Split it on "." for /f "tokens=1,2,3 delims=." %%a in ('echo !ARCHIVE_FILENAME!') do ( set VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL=%%a set VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL=%%b set VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL=%%c )
echo VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL: !VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL! echo VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL: !VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL! echo VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL: !VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL!
::- Now Split the VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL using "_" for /f "tokens=5 delims=_" %%a in ('echo !VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER=%%a )
::- Now Split the VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL using "-" for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=-" %%a in ('echo !VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set VDK_MINOR_NUMBER=%%a set VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER=%%b )
::- Now Split the VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL using "-" for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=-" %%a in ('echo !VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set VDK_BUILD_NUMBER=%%a set VDK_MILESTONE=%%b )
echo VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER: !VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER! echo VDK_MINOR_NUMBER: !VDK_MINOR_NUMBER! echo VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER: !VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER! echo VDK_BUILD_NUMBER: !VDK_BUILD_NUMBER! echo VDK_MILESTONE: !VDK_MILESTONE!
set ENVIRON_FILE=%WORKSPACE%\Environ.props echo VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER=!VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER! > %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_MINOR_NUMBER=!VDK_MINOR_NUMBER! >> %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER=!VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER! >> %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_BUILD_NUMBER=!VDK_BUILD_NUMBER! >> %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_MILESTONE=!VDK_MILESTONE! >> %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION=!VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER!.!VDK_MINOR_NUMBER!.!VDK_BUILD_NUMBER!.!BUILD_NUMBER! >> %ENVIRON_FILE%
endlocal

@echo off setlocal
::--------------------------------------------------------------------- set ISM=%WORKSPACE%\Installers\windows\VDK.ism set COMMMON_MM_DIR=%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Common Files\Merge Modules
::- Before creating the packages, we need to update the name of the MSI directly in the .ism file echo Using PERL bin: %PERL%
%PERL% -pi.bak -e "s!AMD_%VDK_FULL_NAME%_VDK_Setup!AMD_%VDK_FULL_NAME%_VDK_Setup-%VDK_ARTIFACTDISPLAY_NUMBER%!g;" "%ISM%"
set SAMPLES_DIR=%WORKSPACE%\VDK\%VDK_FULL_NAME%\%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%\samples set BIN_DIR=%SAMPLES_DIR%\bin
move /Y "%BIN_DIR%" %WORKSPACE%
echo Executing: "%ISCMDBLD%" -a %V% -r F -v -x -p "%ISM%" -o "%COMMMON_MM_DIR%" -y %VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION% -z VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY="%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z VDK_FULL_NAME=%VDK_FULL_NAME% -z ProductName="AMD %VDK_FULL_DISPLAY_NAME% VDK %VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z EG_VDK_DIR_VERSION="%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -l CertPath=%SystemDrive%\cert -l x86Folder="%WORKSPACE%\bin\x86" -l x86_64Folder="%WORKSPACE%\bin\x86_64" -l RootFolder="%WORKSPACE%\VDK\%VDK_FULL_NAME%" "%ISCMDBLD%" -a %V% -r F -v -x -p "%ISM%" -o "%COMMMON_MM_DIR%" -y %VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION% -z VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY="%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z VDK_FULL_NAME=%VDK_FULL_NAME% -z ProductName="AMD %VDK_FULL_DISPLAY_NAME% VDK %VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z EG_VDK_DIR_VERSION="%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -l CertPath=%SystemDrive%\cert -l x86Folder="%WORKSPACE%\bin\x86" -l x86_64Folder="%WORKSPACE%\bin\x86_64" -l RootFolder="%WORKSPACE%\VDK\%VDK_FULL_NAME%"
endlocal

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
SH_NAME=$(basename "${BASH_SOURCE}")
#Files extracted successfully #Move the contents of the directory recursively VDK/EmbeddedGaming/${VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY} to #$WORKSPACE/$PRODUCTVERSION
echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][INFO]Move the contents of the directory recursively VDK/${VDK_FULL_NAME}/${VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY} to ${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}
mv -vf "VDK/${VDK_FULL_NAME}/$VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY/"* "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}" Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][ERR]Failed to move "VDK/${VDK_FULL_NAME}/${VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY}" ${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION} exit $Retval fi
#Remove the "VDK/${VDK_FULL_NAME}/${VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY}" directory echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][INFO]Remove the "VDK/${VDK_FULL_NAME}/${VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY}" directory rm -rvf VDK Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][ERR]Failed to Remove the "VDK/${VDK_FULL_NAME}/${VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY}" directory exit $Retval fi
rm -rvf "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}/VDK"* Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][ERR]Failed to Remove the ${PRODUCTVERSION}/VDK directory exit $Retval fi
#- Now update the bin directory echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][INFO] Updating the bin directory
mkdir -pv "$WORKSPACE/${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/bin/x86_64" Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][ERR]Failed to Create the bin directory exit $Retval fi
echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][INFO] Copy samples to bin directory mv -vf ${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/*/bin/x86_64/Release/* ${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/bin/x86_64 Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][ERR]Failed to move pre-built samples to the ${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/bin/x86_64 directory exit $Retval fi
rm -rvf "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/qvaBlend/bin" rm -rvf "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/qvaBlend/res" rm -rvf "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/sha256" rm -rvf "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/qvaEncoderTest" rm -rvf "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/qvaPlayback/res" rm -rvf "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/qvaDecoderTest/bin" rm -rvf "${WORKSPACE}/${PRODUCTVERSION}/samples/qvaPlayback/bin"
exit $Retval

#!/bin/bash #Book-keeping script, which creates required directories and sets them up.
echo VDK_EG_BUILD Version being used COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_VDK_EG_BUILD: $COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_VDK_EG_BUILD echo PRODUCTVERSION: $PRODUCTVERSION echo PRODUCTION_URL_VERSION: $PRODUCTION_URL_VERSION echo ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION: $VDK_ARTIFACTDISPLAY_NUMBER echo ARCHIVE_EXTENSION: $ARCHIVE_EXTENSION echo OSTYPE:$OSTYPE echo VDK_EG_METRIC_VERSION: $VDK_EG_METRIC_VERSION echo VDK_EG_DIR_VERSION: $VDK_EG_DIR_VERSION
INSTALL_SCRIPT=$PRODUCTVERSION/install.sh sed -i.bak "s?\[version\]?$VDK_EG_DIR_VERSION?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[version\] with $VDK_EG_DIR_VERSION in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
sed -i.bak "s?\[metricsversion\]?$VDK_EG_METRIC_VERSION?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[metricsversion\] with $VDK_EG_METRIC_VERSION in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
sed -i.bak "s?\[MetricsCollectionTag\]?$MetricsCollectionTag?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[MetricsCollectionTag\] with $MetricsCollectionTag in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
# Replace the [SETUP_ARCHITECTURE] with the actual architecture i.e., x86 or amd64 in install.sh sed -i.bak "s?\[SETUP_ARCHITECTURE\]?$P?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[SETUP_ARCHITECTURE\] with $P in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
#Replace the [VDK_NAME] with the actual value i.e. VDK_EG sed -i.bak "s?\[VDK_NAME\]?VDK_${V}?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[VDK_NAME\] with VDK_${V} in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
#Replace the [VDK_FULL_NAME] with the actual value i.e. VDK_EG sed -i.bak "s?\[VDK_FULL_NAME\]?${VDK_FULL_NAME}?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[VDK_FULL_NAME\] with ${VDK_FULL_NAME} in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
UNINSTALL_SCRIPT=$PRODUCTVERSION/uninstall.sh sed -i.bak "s?\[version\]?$VDK_EG_DIR_VERSION?g" $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[version\] with $VDK_EG_DIR_VERSION in the file $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT exit $Retval fi
#Replace the [VDK_NAME] with the actual value i.e. VDK_EG sed -i.bak "s?\[VDK_NAME\]?VDK_${V}?g" $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[VDK_NAME\] with VDK_${V} in the file $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
#Replace the [VDK_FULL_NAME] with the actual value i.e. VDK_EG sed -i.bak "s?\[VDK_FULL_NAME\]?${VDK_FULL_NAME}?g" $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[VDK_FULL_NAME\] with ${VDK_FULL_NAME} in the file $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
cp -vf "${SHFLAGS}" $PRODUCTVERSION if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo FAILURE: Could not copy $SHFLAGS to $PRODUCTVERSION exit $Retval fi
chmod +x $PRODUCTVERSION/install.sh chmod +x $PRODUCTVERSION/uninstall.sh
rm -vf $PRODUCTVERSION/*.bak
#Copy EULA from "${WORKSPACE}/Installers/UnifiedSDKEULA.txt" to $PRODUCTVERSION cp -vf "${WORKSPACE}/Installers/UnifiedSDKEULA.txt" $PRODUCTVERSION if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo FAILURE: Could not copy "${WORKSPACE}/Installers/UnifiedSDKEULA.txt" to $PRODUCTVERSION exit $Retval fi
dos2unix -k $PRODUCTVERSION/UnifiedSDKEULA.txt chmod -v 444 $PRODUCTVERSION/UnifiedSDKEULA.txt
exit $Retval

#!/bin/bash
#This script creates the architecture specific VDK_EG Linux Packages echo [INFO]PRODUCTVERSION: $PRODUCTVERSION echo [INFO]Extracting headers/libs/sources and $ARCH-bit pre-built binaries and sample sources
for f in *.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION} do echo [INFO]Calling tar -jxvf "$f" -C $PRODUCTVERSION tar --exclude=VDK -jxvf "$f" -C $PRODUCTVERSION done
"$MAKESELF" --bzip2 $PRODUCTVERSION "AMD_${VDK_FULL_NAME}_VDK_Setup-${VDK_ARTIFACTDISPLAY_NUMBER}.sh" "AMD ${VDK_FULL_NAME} VDK v${VDK_ARTIFACTDISPLAY_NUMBER} Self Installing script" ./install.sh
